  • Method Details

    • moveTo

      public boolean moveTo​(DepositSlot selected, int selectedQty, DepositSlot destination) throws DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded, DifferentResourceType, NotEnoughResources, ResourceTypeAlreadyStored
      Integrates switchToDeposit() and transferToDeposit() for an automated selection between the two methods
      Parameters:
      selected - is the one selected by the user
      selectedQty - is the resource quantity that the user wants to move
      destination - is the deposit where the user wants the resources to be placed
      Returns:
      true if transfer or switch deposit ends without exceptions
      Throws:
      DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded - if in the destination deposit there's not enough space to insert the transferred resources
      DifferentResourceType - if the selected slot has some ResourceType restrictions
      NotEnoughResources - if the user wants to move a quantity that's greater than the selected deposit's max dimension
      ResourceTypeAlreadyStored - if another default deposit is already storing the same resource type

    • canTransferDeposit

      public boolean canTransferDeposit​(DepositSlot selected, int selectedQta, DepositSlot destination) throws DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded, DifferentResourceType, NotEnoughResources, ResourceTypeAlreadyStored
      Checks if the controller can transfer some number of resources from one deposit(selected) to another(destination)
      Parameters:
      selected - is the one selected by the user
      selectedQta - is the resource quantity that the user wants to move
      destination - is the deposit where the user wants the resources to be placed
      Returns:
      true if the user chose a legit quantity from the selected deposit that can fits in the target deposit
      Throws:
      DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded - if in the destination deposit there's not enough space to insert the transferred resources
      DifferentResourceType - if the selected slot has some ResourceType restrictions
      NotEnoughResources - if the user wants to move a quantity that's greater than the selected deposit's max dimension
      ResourceTypeAlreadyStored

    • transferToDeposit

      public boolean transferToDeposit​(DepositSlot selected, int selectedQta, DepositSlot destination)
      Transfer a selected number of resources from one deposit to another (destination)
      Parameters:
      selected - is the one selected by the user
      selectedQta - is the resource quantity that the user wants to move
      destination - is the deposit where the user wants the resources to be placed
      Returns:
      true

    • canSwitchDeposit

      public boolean canSwitchDeposit​(DepositSlot selected, DepositSlot destination) throws DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded, ResourceTypeAlreadyStored
      Checks if the controller can call switchDeposit() in order to switch some number of resources of different kinds from one deposit(selected) to another(destination)
      Parameters:
      selected - is the one selected by the user
      destination - is the deposit that will switch resources with the selected one
      Returns:
      true if the Deposit's type can switch his resources with another generic deposit
      Throws:
      DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded - if in the destination deposit there's not enough space to insert the transferred resources
      ResourceTypeAlreadyStored - if another default deposit is already storing the same resource type

    • switchToDeposit

      public boolean switchToDeposit​(DepositSlot selected, DepositSlot destination)
      Switch resources from one deposit to another (destination)
      Parameters:
      selected - is the one selected by the user
      destination - is the deposit that will switch resources with the selected one
      Returns:
      true

    • removeDepositSlot

      public boolean removeDepositSlot​(DepositSlot depositSlot)
      warning: this feature should not be used according to the rules of the base game removes a DepositSlot from the depositList
      Parameters:
      depositSlot - DepositSlot to remove
      Returns:
      false if there is an argument exception (NoSuchElementException)

    • mustDiscardResource

    • getDefaultSlot_WithDim

      public DepositSlot getDefaultSlot_WithDim​(int i)
      get method to retrieve the DefaultDeposit's slots indexes
      Parameters:
      i - is the index related to the default slot with max_dim = i
      Returns:
      the desired index of the default slot or the first slot with max_dim = 1 if it receives '0' as input
